page.title: 10INDUSTRY _FOXTON
page.content: The other main industry of the area is connected with agriculture and although we will deal with Farming later it is worth cosidering the industries which serve the farms. Harrison brothers run an agricultural supply and engineering business.This offers a mobile repair service for any type of farm machine.If neccessary a replacement machine can be supplied. The brothers also offer for hire various farm items from manure to combine harvester. This industry is located on the edge of our block at the east side.
